original_text: Then will I cause you to dwell in this place, in the land that I gave to your fathers, for ever and ever.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 이 곳에 살게 하리니 곧 너희 조상에게 영원무궁토록 준 땅에니라

sentences.original_text: Then will I cause you to dwell in this place
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 내가 너희를 이 곳에 거하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: in the land that I gave to your fathers
